name: Tusked Skyfish
description: The Tusked Skyfish is a large creature with tusks, known for its unique offensive capabilities and defensive traits. It can inflict significant lightning damage and immobilize its enemies with grappling tentacles.
memorable: Unique ability to combine grappling with mobility, creating a formidable combat presence.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate opponents using its grappling abilities and area attacks.
relations: May be encountered with other aberrations or creatures of the same environment.
environment: Usually found in waterlogged areas or places abundant in moisture.
strengths: Immune to lightning damage, excels in physical attacks, able to grapple and restrain targets while moving.
attacks: Multiattack featuring a Gore attack that deals piercing damage and Electrified Tentacles that can grapple while dealing bludgeoning and lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Stench Spray can incapacitate enemies and deal significant poison damage in a wide area.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and has a passive perception of 12.
skills: Low perception skills, with a passive perception that is not exceptionally high.
additional_information: Electrified Tendrils deal damage for contact and area control.
Can grapple and move simultaneously, enhancing battlefield mobility.
Stench Spray causes poison damage and can render foes unconscious.
Low intelligence imposes weak tactical thought.
Significant pressure on grappled foes with ongoing lightning damage.
test_queries: large formidable aberration with electric attacks
mobile grappler that uses poison and lightning
area attack with poison damage and unconscious effect
agile predator with grappling and shocking tentacles
